name: send message to messanger
code:
Intent %1$s = new Intent(); %1$s.setAction(Intent.ACTION_SEND); %1$s.putExtra(Intent.EXTRA_TEXT, "%2$s"); %1$s.setType("text/plain"); %1$s.setPackage("com.facebook.orca"); 
try { startActivity(%1$s); } catch (android.content.ActivityNotFoundException ex) {  SketchwareUtil.showMessage(getApplicationContext(), "Facebook Messenger Not Installed"); }
